tool_description:
Keep an snapshot of any provided URL forever at the Internet Archive (other stores coming up soon)
Simply requests a URL to be archived and then wait for the Job to complete to receive an archived URL, kept safe forever

1) Post to https://url-archiver.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/archive  with your Payload
2) Get from https://url-archiver.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/taskStatus/taskId
name: URL Archiver
title: URL Archiver

api_list.name: archivewrapper_api_v1_task_status
